pkmkdoc.description:
Create as 2012/7/15 1.Update version 1.0d0715 at 2012/7/15. 2.Update version 1.0d0802 at 2012/8/2. modify magnet-spine spec to [500,780] gauss.
Update 2012/08/17 1.remove frameworks
Update 2012/10/23 1.Change the color: Polarity NG parts show in red(Reject). Parts out of flux upper limit show in yellow(Reject). Parts out of flux lower limit show in white(Verify by Go/No go). OK parts show in green(OK). 2.Change version from 1.0d0817 to 1.0d1023
Update 2012/10/25 1.Modify serial number scan function, remove "\r" from the string read from scanner.
Update 2013/04/25 1.move setting file from "~/Library" to "/Library". 2.move app to Application 3.Change version from 1.0d1023 to 20130425
